# beget_software (Data Source)

Single marketplace software image. Retrieve detailed metadata about a marketplace software image by slug, including install-time variables.

## Variables
Each software image exposes install-time inputs:

- `variable`: identifier used in API payloads
- `label` / `description`: user-facing hints
- `is_required`: whether Terraform must provide a value

## Inspecting Details
Use this data source to inspect metadata before wiring it into
`beget_compute_instance`. The `variables` list contains per-field constraints
such as regex validation or default values.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# List install variables for Beget VPN
data "beget_software" "ipsec" {
  slug = "ipsec"
}

locals {
  variables = {
    for v in data.beget_software.ipsec.variables :
    v.variable => {
      label       = v.label
      required    = v.is_required
      description = v.description
    }
  }
}

output "ipsec_variables" {
  value = local.variables
}
```
```terraform
# Inspect Beget VPN image metadata
data "beget_software" "ipsec" {
  slug = "ipsec"
}

output "ipsec_metadata" {
  value = {
    id           = data.beget_software.ipsec.id
    display_name = data.beget_software.ipsec.display_name
    version      = data.beget_software.ipsec.version
    description  = data.beget_software.ipsec.description
  }
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `slug` (String)

### Read-Only

- `description` (String)
- `display_name` (String)
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
- `variables` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--variables))
- `version` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--variables"></a>
### Nested Schema for `variables`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
- `is_required` (Boolean)
- `label` (String)
- `variable` (String)
